page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE OF-MORETON
page.content: We interviewed a{cashier}at a local bank. She described her day. She gets up at 07:00. Before breakfast she has a bath. She meets her friends and gets to work at 09:00. When the bank opens at 09:30 she deals with foreign currency, cashes cheques and tells customers their balances. Sometimes she goes shopping at lunch time. When the bank closes at 15:00 she takes the post to postbox and she leaves for home at 17:00. At home she relaxes and in her spare time she plays badminton. Next we saw a{policeman.}He starts work at 08:00. First he checks the post and the night messages. Then he walks or drives around the town. After lunch he goes to see people. Then he drives round again. He finishes at 16:00. Sometimes he works a night shift. He can see his family thirteen weekends a year.
